app.title: EPIK - AI Photo & Video Editor
app.description:
Use professional editing tools and powerful AI technology to easily and conveniently edit photos. Compatible with RAW files.

[AI tool]
„Éª Enhance: Improve clarity and resolution! Create high-quality photos
„Éª AI skin: Perfect your skin by AI correcting blemishes
„Éª Smart AI cutout: Carefully separate figures, objects, and even animals
„Éª Remove: Easily remove unwanted parts
„Éª AI filter: Create your own characters in different styles
„Éª Hairstyle and Expression: Create a new look

[Professional photo editing tools]
„Éª HSL, Curves, Split Tone, Selective: Precise color adjustments
„Éª Lux, Texture, Grain, Brilliance, Vignette: Create different moods
„Éª Crop, Rotate, Mirror, Flip, Perspective, Adjust resolution: Set the composition you want
„Éª Batch: Edit multiple photos at once
„Éª Patch, Clone: Naturally edit or copy a specific part

[Perfect portraits]
„Éª Looks: Experience the magic of one-tap beauty with skin retouch, makeup, face tuner, and filters all at once
„Éª Erase wrinkles, AI Skin, Blemishes : Smooth skin without blemishes
„Éª Reshape, 3D Face, Mirror correction Individual Left-Right Adjustment, Preset, Perspective: Natural and detailed face correction
„Éª Style, Paint, Fine tune: Stylish makeup perfect for your face
„Éª Body,Length: Take perfect full-body photos! Create the body you want
„Éª Hair Color, Hairstyle: Transform with different hairstyles

[Trendy content]
„Éª Filters, Effects, Relight: Create a trendy feel
„Éª Stickers, Text, Paint, Draw shapes: Make your photos more unique
„Éª Time stamp: Record your special moments
„Éª Template: Thousands of customizable templates

[Creative Tools]
„Éª AI Collage: Create unique collages with different photos
„Éª Spot color: Highlight the color you want
„Éª Mosaic: Try various mosaic and blur effects
„Éª Cutout, Separate: Smart cropping
„Éª Layout: Combine photos in cool arrangements
„Éª Background, Pattern: Create your own unique backgrounds
„Éª Custom stickers, create one-of-a-kind filters

[Movie feature]
„Éª Video mosaic: Easy mosaics with automatic figure tracking
„Éª Retro Clip: Create vintage videos easily
„Éª Video Face Edit: Retouch faces naturally in videos


For inquiries about subscriptions, 
contact [EPIK > Profile > Settings > Contact].

app.summary: All-In-One editor for retouching, adjusting, decorating photo and video Editor

reviews.text: Hi... When m working on two different layers n I start to work on 2nd layer, the changes I made on it, it affects on the background also which is wrong, so I can't use it for multiple layers..... Also, when I remove unwanted element it should clean it fine instead it leaves smudges. Pls fix these problems. I have to uninstall it for now. Thank you

I have problems! 1. I can't see template while editing even if I already downloaded them. 2. While editing I doesn't have remove option when I click on it it seems like"this feature is not supported for your device" how unfair it is.And same is happened with 'Al filter. But by the way ,the app is good.and I'm sure if you improve it so I will also give that missing two star . And one more thing , for me it is the best app if you add "camera" in it . I want template, stickers and more offline.

I recently started using the EPIK editing app and I have to say, I am impressed! The app has so many useful features that have made editing my photos a breeze. My favorite feature by far is the 'Relight' tool, which allows me to adjust the lighting of my photos in just a few clicks. Overall, I find the EPIK app to be very user-friendly and intuitive. It's so cool to see the transformation of my photos with just a few tweaks. I highly recommend this app.....

I would badly want one problem to be fixed, I downloaded this app a few days ago and I have been trying and trying to start editing but all that happens is one message pops up that I need to allow storage permission even though I have allowed it I can't even strat editing, I love using editing apps, but never found one perfect for me, this one seems to be the best,but they won't let me begin üò≠ if this could be fix, I don't think I would ever have to move onto another app,waiting for the update!
reviews.replyText:
Dear Sheeza Sarfraz,
First, We are truly sorry for the inconvenience. To clarify the issue, could you send us some more information to [epik@snowcorp.com]?
Device name,
Videos that captures Specific situation that you are having trouble with(It will use only for solving issues) It would help us get the issue and solve it soon. EPIK

reviews.text: EDIT: Love this app for many reason, but in all categories, aside, from stickers maybe..no, they got good, then got too comfortable while every one else kept going.. Meitu, Hyptic, . You can't blame them, bit the recently added watermark sucks, but easy enough to remove, really, can't blame them. Best stickers, good filter,.great adjustments. The "portrait" adjustments- gone.

Love it! I would give it 5 stars if only it wasn't laggy when using a template. Other than that, the app is amazing, especially the automatic layer so we can edit it freely whenever we want to sooner or later. This is because in another app I usually forget to add a layer, so I have to redo it again and again. It's also have so many stickers, brushes etc that we can choose. Totally recommended!

...so, it turns out this app is quite appropriately named -- and in more ways than one -- cos not only do the app's multitude of modes provide you with an abundance of great start-off points to choose from, but then with what seems to be infinite beautiful and super well-made shooting and/or editing functions taking over from there, urging you on a surprise 'adventure', toward your goal of 'taking another picture' and so on and so on. What's NOT epic about it? üòâüòâ

Used to, I would have given this app FIVE stars! It was just AMAZING! I just noticed, though, that a SHITTON of the effects, filters, stickers, etc that used to be free are, NOW, ONLY in the Pro version! I'm on disability ONLY, which is a VERY fixed income...Half the time, I can barely afford to survive, much less pay for Pro versions of apps. That's not quite a necessity, which is something I have to stick to. I'm very, VERY disappointed with this change, as this app WAS my very FAVORITE app!

Downloaded it to try the yearbook filter that absolutely everyone is using. Went through all the steps before getting to the last one, the image generation, only for it to be blocked behind a paywall. What a joke. It would have been nice to have known before going through the faff of trying to find images on my phone, which was made worse by it constantly telling me i couldnt use certain selfies of mine. I was really excited to try it too. What a total dissapointment. Don't download.

This app is literally ‚ú®GOLD‚ú® I cannot emphasize enough on how amazing this app is. It has everything, it really stands up to its name! I just really hope that after a couple of months or years have passed the features won't be premium or you'll have to pay the other features to be able to use them. Which is one thing why it's so annoying to use other editing apps because you need to pay. For the makers of this app I'm glad I found you! Please, don't make the other features premium hehehehe.

[Reshape] Lock the background and make subtle corrections!
[Makeup] Try different lip makeup with new lip styles.
[AI Assistant] Get the perfect editing recommendations for your content.
[Text] Search to find the font you need right away.
[Adjust] Auto-adjust makes correction easier! Make your photo perfect with just a touch.
[Remove] Recognition has become more precise, and an outline feature has been added!
[Crop] Crop for social media with a simple touch.
app.AIReview:
EPIK - AI Photo & Video Editor Review

Overview

EPIK ‚Äì AI Photo & Video Editor is an ambitious offering in the crowded mobile photo editing landscape, promising professional-grade tools powered by artificial intelligence. With a staggering 71,053,083 installs and a robust 4.416 rating from over 623,027 users, EPIK has clearly resonated with a large audience seeking convenient and intelligent image manipulation solutions. The app‚Äôs core proposition revolves around simplifying complex editing tasks through AI, allowing users ‚Äì regardless of their technical skill level ‚Äì to achieve polished results quickly. The fact that it supports RAW files further distinguishes it, appealing to serious photographers who demand maximum control over their images. This review delves into the functionality and user experience of EPIK, assessing its strengths, weaknesses, and ultimately, determining if it justifies its free price tag.

Key Features

EPIK boasts a comprehensive suite of editing features categorized around both AI-powered tools and traditional photo/video adjustments. Let‚Äôs break down the key offerings:

  • AI Enhancement: This is arguably the headline feature, utilizing AI to automatically improve clarity, resolution, and overall quality of photos. The ‚ÄúEnhance‚Äù tool promises dramatically improved results with minimal user input ‚Äì a significant time-saver for quick edits.
  • AI Skin Correction: Targeting blemish removal and skin smoothing, this feature leverages AI to subtly refine portraits, addressing a common pain point for users sharing images on social media.
  • Smart AI Cutout: This tool distinguishes itself through its ability to precisely isolate subjects ‚Äì including figures, objects, and even animals ‚Äì offering a far more intuitive solution than traditional selection tools. The accuracy of this feature is crucial to its success.
  • Remove Tool: A straightforward object removal tool powered by AI, allowing users to seamlessly erase unwanted elements from their images.
  • AI Filter & Style Creation: Users can explore and experiment with diverse styles using the ‚ÄúAI filter‚Äù feature, or even create entirely new looks based on existing ones. This includes options for generating stylized characters ‚Äì a potentially engaging feature for creative experimentation.
  • Hairstyle & Expression Transformation: This unique tool allows users to digitally alter hairstyles and facial expressions, effectively creating "what if" scenarios with their photos.
  • Traditional Photo Editing Tools: Alongside the AI features, EPIK includes standard editing tools such as brightness, contrast, saturation adjustments, cropping, rotating, and applying various filters.
  • Video Editing Capabilities: The app extends beyond still images, offering basic video editing functionality including trimming, merging clips, and adding music.

Strengths

Several aspects of EPIK contribute to its popularity:

  • Ease of Use: The AI-powered features significantly reduce the learning curve for new users. Tasks that would typically require extensive knowledge of photo editing are simplified with a single tap.
  • Powerful AI Engine: The underlying AI algorithms, particularly in the cutout and enhancement tools, demonstrate impressive accuracy and effectiveness. The ‚ÄòSmart AI Cutout‚Äô is notably superior to many competing apps.
  • Broad Feature Set: The combination of AI and traditional editing tools provides users with considerable flexibility in achieving their desired results. Support for RAW files adds a professional dimension.
  • Large User Base & Positive Reviews: The app's high install count and average rating indicate widespread satisfaction amongst its user base, suggesting solid core functionality.

Areas for Improvement

Despite its strengths, EPIK isn‚Äôt without areas needing refinement:

  • AI Processing Speed: At times, the AI processing can feel sluggish, particularly when utilizing complex features like the Smart AI Cutout. Faster performance would dramatically improve the workflow.
  • Filter Customization Limitations: While the AI filter feature is interesting, its customization options could be expanded to allow for more precise control over stylistic effects. Users desire greater creative freedom.
  • Video Editing Depth: The video editing capabilities are relatively basic compared to dedicated video editing apps. More advanced features such as color grading and audio mixing would greatly enhance this aspect.
  • Tutorials & Onboarding: While the app is generally easy to use, a more comprehensive onboarding tutorial could better highlight the capabilities of each feature, especially the AI tools.

User Experience

The user interface (UI) of EPIK is clean, modern, and intuitive. The layout is logically organized, separating the AI features from traditional editing tools for easier navigation. Swiping gestures are employed effectively throughout the app, facilitating smooth transitions between different functionalities. The visual feedback provided by the AI tools ‚Äì real-time previews ‚Äì are crucial to user confidence and allows immediate adjustments. However, occasional UI glitches or minor lag could detract slightly from the overall experience.

Value for Money

EPIK is offered entirely free of charge, a significant advantage in a market dominated by paid photo editing apps. This makes it an accessible option for anyone looking to explore AI-powered image enhancement without financial commitment. The reliance on advertising within the free version is relatively minimal and doesn't significantly disrupt the user experience.

Conclusion

EPIK ‚Äì AI Photo & Video Editor represents a compelling entry in the mobile photo editing space. Its powerful AI tools, combined with a user-friendly interface and broad feature set, make it a viable alternative to established competitors, particularly for users seeking an accessible introduction to intelligent image manipulation. While improvements could be made in processing speed and filter customization, the app‚Äôs strengths ‚Äì especially its Smart AI Cutout ‚Äì significantly outweigh its shortcomings. Given that it's completely free, EPIK is undoubtedly worth downloading and exploring; it's a solid choice for both casual users and those looking to experiment with cutting-edge photo editing technology. The continued popularity of the app suggests it‚Äôs meeting a genuine demand within the market.
